title: SPA DRAIN ULTRA
long_description: SPA DRAIN ULTRAÂ is a spa pipe cleaner and descaler kit. It contains 3 numbered products to be added to the spa in easy steps.
short_description: BENEFITS Eliminates organic matter deposits Removes and dissolves calcium build-ups in pipes

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle the contents of the products on the surface of the spa water according to the instructions.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Remove headrests (cartridges can remain in the spa during the process). Sprinkle the entire content of No. 1 pouch, followed by No. 2 product. Run the spa pumps for 4 hours. After the 4-hour wait, pour the content of No. 3 product and activate the pumps for 15 minutes. Drain. Rinse the cartridges and refill with fresh water.

dosage.specifications: One kit treats up to 2,000 L of spa water.

warning: Always keep the spa cover open during the cleaning process. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa.
